# Interface AbstractNodeProps

Base configuration for any graph node.

interface AbstractNodeProps {  
id?: string;  
reportToClient?: boolean;  
}

#### Hierarchy ([View Summary](/hierarchy#graph/dsl/nodes/builtin/abstract_node.AbstractNodeProps))

  * AbstractNodeProps
    * [CustomNodeProps](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_custom_node.CustomNodeProps)



##### Index

### Properties

id? reportToClient?

## Properties

### `Optional`id

id?: string

Optional explicit node identifier.

#### Remarks

If omitted, a stable auto-generated ID based on the class name is assigned.

### `Optional`reportToClient

reportToClient?: boolean

Whether this node should report its outputs to the client.

#### Remarks

Useful for telemetry/debugging. Defaults to `false`.

### Settings

Member Visibility

  * Protected
  * Inherited
  * External
